title: The Little Mermaid Live! cast unveiled in full costume for the first time in new promo video
text:
Eager fans are getting a first look at the cast of ABC's The Little Mermain Live! in costume in a new promo video.

The upcoming special, live event, which is part of Disney's 30th anniversary celebration of the beloved animated film, stars Auli'i Cravalho, Queen Latifah, Shaggy, Graham Phillips and John Stamos.

It will feature live musical performances from the cast, along with intricate live sets, costumes and songs from the original 1989 film and the Tony-nominated Broadway stage version.

First look: ABC shared the first look at The Little Mermaid Live cast in full costume

In the 30-second video Cravalho transforms into Ariel, mermaid princess of Atlantica, with her red tresses and eyebrows, while Latifah channels sea witch Ursula with her white hair and gold shell necklace.

Shaggy was introduced as Sebastian the crab, dressed accordingly in an all-red ensemble.

As Chef Louis, Stamos looks picture perfect decked out in a white chef's outfit and red scarf, along with a manicured mustache.

Phillips' Prince Eric is the last of the five characters to pop-up in the video looking simple, but classic, in a white shirt.

Leading lady: Cravalho transforms into Ariel, mermaid princess of Atlantica, with her red tresses and eyebrows and purple ensemble

Her promise: 'I'll see you under the sea for @abcnetwork’s #TheLittleMermaidLive', Latifah wrote in the caption of the promo video she shared on Instagram

Cravalho shared the video on Instagram and wrote: 'Dive under the sea with us for @ABCNetwork's #The Little MermaidLive!'

Latifah also got into promo mode and took to social media.

'I'll see you under the sea for @abcnetwork’s #TheLittleMermaidLive', she wrote in the caption.

John Stamos added: 'Hee, hee, hee- ha, ha, HAW! So excited to bring Chef Louis to life! @ABCnetwork's #TheLittleMermaidLive!'

Shaggy was introduced as Sebastian the crab, dressed accordingly in an all-red ensemble

Giddy with excitement: 'Hee, hee, hee- ha, ha, HAW! So excited to bring Chef Louis to life!' Stamos said of the event

Anticipation: Graham Phillips plays Prince Eric for the special, live event

The highly-anticipated live concert will 'take viewers on a magical adventure under the sea as live musical performances by a star-studded cast will be interwoven into the broadcast of the original feature film,' according to ABC.

As part of the 30th anniversary celebration, Disney is also making a live-action feature adaption of the 1989 movie that will star Halle Bailey as Ariel. It is expected to begin production in 2020.

The Wonderful World of Disney Presents The Little Mermaid Live! hits the airwaves, November 5 at 8pm on ABC.
description: The Little Mermaid Live! cast were seen in full costume for the first time in new 30-second promotional video that was released on Sunday, one month before the live event will air.
